question: I am going to list some different political and social actions that people can take. Have you done this ...  f. given money to an organization that works on political or social issues
options: Have done in the past year
Have done in the more distant past
Have not done, but might do
Have not done and would never, under any circumstances, do
raw_output:
I have donated money to organizations working on political or social issues within the past year, as I believe supporting causes I care about is important and I actively get involved when possible. 

ANSWER: A
